prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek, blue body and coral-like features.
Imagine a unique aquatic creature inspired by seahorses, with vibrant colors and flowing fins.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a dragon but lives underwater, showcasing shades of blue.
Give me a Pokemon that has a serpentine shape, with scaly textures and spiky fins.
Show me a water Pokemon that has both elegance and a fierce demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon with a combination of soft curves and sharp spikes, primarily in blue.
Make a mystical creature that dwells in oceans, with iridescent scales and a long tail.
